channel.title: Pranav Kottoli Radhakrishna on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Pranav Kottoli Radhakrishna on My New Hugo Site

item.title: about
item.description: Data Science and analytics are my passion. My name is Pranav Kottoli Radhakrishna. I’m a Data Scientist with a strong background in Software Development. Through my coursework, I have gained experience with Data visualization, Machine Learning, Data Analysis, and Statistics. I have worked on several projects that make use of Data Science and Data Analytics to answer questions using data Skills and Tools Pages Elements Languages Python | R | SQL | Pyspark Machine Learning: pandas | numpy | sklearn | PyTorch | SparkML | caret Visualization seaborn | matplotlib | ggplot | Tableau

item.title: background
item.description: Experience iConsult Collaborative Data Scientist Aug 2020-Present Responsibilities: Interacting with healthcare staff at Crouse Hospital to identify factors that are most likely to indicate Diabetes. Building an ETL pipeline to transform and load raw data into SQL Server in a format suitable for Machine Learning. Designing a workflow in Alteryx to construct a prediction model to diagnose over 200,000 patients. Syracuse University Graduate Teaching Assistant: Big Data Analytics Aug 2020-Dec 2020 Responsibilities: Mentored students in concepts like Regression, Artificial Neural Networks, Decision Trees and Ensemble Learning.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Credit Default Risk Prediction Mar 2020-May 2020 Description: The major goal of this project is to find a robust way to assess whether a potential customer will default on a loan using historical customer data. This is a binary classification problem that was solved using the Logistic Regression, Random Forest and Gradient Boosting algorithms. Project Code Project Dashboard Grocery Store Sales Forecasting Oct 2020-Nov 2020 Description: The goal of this project is to predict the sales of an Ecuadorian grocery store chain using multi-step time series data.
